FACILITY_TOILET_1_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Accessible toilet. The facility is located between Hjultorv and St. Hjultorvgyde behind Café Morville. Most easily accessed from St. Hjultorvgyde.
FACILITY_RAMP_1_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Level access to the gardens from the corner of Kompagnistræde and Sankt Mathias Gade.
FACILITY_RAMP_2_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Level access to the church from the corner of St. Sankt Mikkels Gade and Sortebr. Kirke Stræde.
FACILITY_RAMP_3_TITEL: Entrance to the garden behind Skovgaard Museum
FACILITY_RAMP_3_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Level access to the garden from Sct. Mogens Gade behind Skovgaard Museum.
FACILITY_RAMP_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Level access to the gardens from Sct. Mogens Gade by Nytorvgyde.
FACILITY_RAMP_5_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Level access to the gardens from Sct. Mogensgade just north of Gråbrødre Kirke Str.
FACILITY_RAMP_6_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Level access to the priory from Sct. Mogens Gade where it meets Ll. Sankt Hans Gade.
FACILITY_RAMP_7_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Level access from the north of the church, by Stænderpladsen.
FACILITY_PARKING_1_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: 277 parking spaces laid out as outdoor bays as well as underground parking facility. Motor-cycle parking and disabled parking available.
FACILITY_PARKING_2_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: 479 parking spaces on an upper deck as well as underground parking – outside and inside. Motor-cycle parking and disabled parking available.
FACILITY_PARKING_3_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: 59 parking spaces. Motor-cycle parking and disabled parking available.
